short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin uses ChatGPT to summarize and analyze E-commerce Website  product reviews with quick insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome plugin aims to use ChatGPT, which can summarize opinions and analyze key indicators of  E-commerce Websit product reviews such as Amazon,shopee ,  helping brand or store personnel quickly analyse the insights of consumer reviews and  download the initial comments.
long.zh_CN: The chrome plugin aims to use ChatGPT, which can summarize opinions and analyze key indicators of Amazon product reviews, helping brand or store personnel quickly analyse the insights of consumer reviews and  download the initial comments.
